section.title: About program stage entry forms
section.para: A program stage has three types of data entry forms:

listitem.para: Custom data entry form - Define a data entry form as HTML page. click on the program stage which you would like and select to define custom data entry form. The system supports to define a custom entry form with multi stages. So this form can be re-used in other stages of the same program.

Section data entry form - Group some data elements which belong to the program stage as sections and display data elements by each section. Click on the program stage which you would like and select Section management link to define section data entry form.
Default data entry form - List all data elements which belong to the program stage.
Open the Program / Attributes app and click Program.
Click the program you want to add a program stage to and select View program stages.
A list of existing stages for the selected program opens. If the program doesn't have any program stages, the list is empty.
Click Add new.
Enter program stage details:
Enter a Name.
Enter a Description.
In the Scheduled days from start field, enter the minimum number of days to wait for starting the program stage.
Enter repeatable program stage details.
Specify if the program stage is Repeatable or not.
Select a Period type.
Enter Standard interval days.
The number of days to repeat the repeatable program stage.

Clear Display generate event box after completed if you don't want to display Create new event box to create new event for a repeatable stage after you click Complete for an event of the stage in data entry form. This field is select by default.
Enter form details.
Clear this to prevent for creating an event of this program stage automatically when a entity enroll into the program.

para.emphasis: Open data entry form after enrollment

listitem.para: Automatically open the event of this stage as soon as the entity has enrolled into the program.
The date is used for report date of the event opened automatically. There are two options , include Incident date or Enrollment date.
If the Report date to use is selected as one of those two('incident date'/'enrollment date'), in Dashboard, the 'Report date' of the event will be set as one of those two.
Check on it for blocking entry form after completed the event of this stage. The data values in the entry form cannot be changed until the status of the event is reset as incomplete.

para.emphasis: Ask user to complete program when stage is completed

listitem.para: If this property is set, a popup will come up to ask if user wants to create the event of next stage.

para.emphasis: Ask user to create new event when stage is complete

listitem.para: If this property is set, a popup will come up to ask if user wants to create a new event of this stage when an event of this stage completed. This property is active only when Repeatable field is set.
Check on it for auto-generating due dates of events from program-stages of this program based on the enrollment date. If it is not checked, the due dates are generated based on incident date.

Many types of events may be recorded at a facility or be owned-by a health worker at a facility, but actually take place somewhere in the community. This field is checked to get coordinates of the place.

para.emphasis: Complete allowed only if validation passes

listitem.para: The event created by this program stage is completed only when all validation rules are passed.
Select if you want to Pre-generate event UID.
Description of report date - The description for report date which is displayed in case entry form.
Assign data elements:
In the list of Available data elements, double-click the data elements you want to assign to the program stage.
For each assigned data element, review the properties. You can select:
The value of this data element must be filled into data entry form before completing the event.
Specify if the value of this data element comes from other facility, not in the facility where this data is entered.
Display the value of this data element into the single event without registration data entry function.
Allow to select a date in future for date data elements.
Click Add.

section.title: Change program stage sort order
section.para: To sort program stages by scheduled days, click Sort by scheduled days button.

listitem.para: Open the Program / Attributes app and click Program.
Click the relevant program and select View program stages.
A list of existing stages for the selected program opens. If the program doesn't have any program stages, the list is empty.
Click the program stage you want to modify and select Edit.
Modify the options you want.
Click Update.
Open the Program / Attributes app and click Program.
Click the relevant program and select View program stages.
A list of existing stages for the selected program opens. If the program doesn't have any program stages, the list is empty.
Click the program stage you want to display and select Show details.
Open the Program / Attributes app and click Program.
Click the relevant program and select View program stages.
A list of existing stages for the selected program opens. If the program doesn't have any program stages, the list is empty.
Click the program stage you want to modify and select Translate.
Select a locale.
Type a Name.
Click Save.
